onetomany.bargainingchipsgame.interactions

Class Thread

  • java.lang.Object
    • onetomany.bargainingchipsgame.interactions.Thread

  • public class Thread
extends java.lang.Object
    Thread is a for a bilateral negotiation. It is defined by introducing two parties and a list of actions exchanging between the two.
    Author:
    Faria Nassiri-Mofakham
